role.label: Cash and Cash Equivalent
role.documentation: Amount of cash and cash equivalent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.

role.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Fair Value Disclosure
role.documentation: Fair value portion of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for cash and cash equivalents, including the policy for determining which items are treated as cash equivalents. Other information that may be disclosed includes (1) the nature of any restrictions on the entity's use of its cash and cash equivalents, (2) whether the entity's cash and cash equivalents are insured or expose the entity to credit risk, (3) the classification of any negative balance accounts (overdrafts), and (4) the carrying basis of cash equivalents (for example, at cost) and whether the carrying amount of cash equivalents approximates fair value.

role.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Entity's cash and cash equivalents accounting policy with respect to restricted balances. Restrictions may include legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against short-term borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or company statements of intention with regard to particular deposits; however, time deposits and short-term certificates of deposit are not generally included in legally restricted deposits.

role.label: Concentration Risk, Credit Risk, Policy [Policy Text Block]

role.label: Consolidation, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy regarding (1) the principles it follows in consolidating or combining the separate financial statements, including the principles followed in determining the inclusion or exclusion of subsidiaries or other entities in the consolidated or combined financial statements and (2) its treatment of interests (for example, common stock, a partnership interest or other means of exerting influence) in other entities, for example consolidation or use of the equity or cost methods of accounting. The accounting policy may also address the accounting treatment for intercompany accounts and transactions, noncontrolling interest, and the income statement treatment in consolidation for issuances of stock by a subsidiary.

role.label: Construction in Progress [Member]
role.documentation: Structure or a modification to a structure under construction. Includes recently completed structures or modifications to structures that have not been placed into service.

role.label: Debt Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for information about short-term and long-term debt arrangements, which includes amounts of borrowings under each line of credit, note payable, commercial paper issue, bonds indenture, debenture issue, own-share lending arrangements and any other contractual agreement to repay funds, and about the underlying arrangements, rationale for a classification as long-term, including repayment terms, interest rates, collateral provided, restrictions on use of assets and activities, whether or not in compliance with debt covenants, and other matters important to users of the financial statements, such as the effects of refinancing and noncompliance with debt covenants.

role.label: Debt Instrument [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.documentation: Disclosure of information about long-term debt instrument or arrangement.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Unused Borrowing Capacity, Amount

role.label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Maximum Contractual Term
role.documentation: Maximum term of the deferred compensation arrangement, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents the reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.label: Deferred Costs, Leasing, Net, Noncurrent
role.documentation: This element represents costs incurred by the lessor that are (a) costs to originate a lease incurred in transactions with independent third parties that (i) result directly from and are essential to acquire that lease and (ii) would not have been incurred had that leasing transaction not occurred and (b) certain costs directly related to specified activities performed by the lessor for that lease. Those activities are: evaluating the prospective lessee's financial condition; evaluating and recording guarantees, collateral, and other security arrangements; negotiating lease terms; preparing and processing lease documents; and closing the transaction. The costs represented by this element are those costs not expected to be recognized in (amortized to) earnings within one year from the date of the statement of financial position or operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Deferred Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of deferred federal tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, deferred national tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

role.label: Deferred Foreign Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of deferred foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

role.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

role.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

role.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations [Abstract]
Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
role.documentation: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

role.documentation: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, deferred regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

role.documentation: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible tax credit carryforwards, classified as other.

role.documentation: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible research tax credit carryforwards.

role.documentation: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

role.documentation: Deferred tax liabilities operating lease right of use assets

role.documentation: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

role.label: Deferred Tax Liability Not Recognized, Amount of Unrecognized Deferred Tax Liability, Undistributed Earnings of Foreign Subsidiaries
role.documentation: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized because of the exceptions to comprehensive recognition of deferred taxes related to undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiaries.

role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of disaggregation of revenue into categories depicting how nature, amount, timing, and uncertainty of revenue and cash flows are affected by economic factor.

role.label: Document Annual Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as an annual report.

role.label: Document Financial Statement Error Correction [Flag]
role.documentation: Indicates whether any of the financial statement period in the filing include a restatement due to error correction.

role.label: Document Fiscal Period Focus
role.documentation: Fiscal period values are FY, Q1, Q2, and Q3. 1st, 2nd and 3rd quarter 10-Q or 10-QT statements have value Q1, Q2, and Q3 respectively, with 10-K, 10-KT or other fiscal year statements having FY.

role.label: Document Fiscal Year Focus
role.documentation: This is focus fiscal year of the document report in YYYY format. For a 2006 annual report, which may also provide financial information from prior periods, fiscal 2006 should be given as the fiscal year focus. Example: 2006.

role.label: Document Period End Date
role.documentation: For the EDGAR submission types of Form 8-K: the date of the report, the date of the earliest event reported; for the EDGAR submission types of Form N-1A: the filing date; for all other submission types: the end of the reporting or transition period. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD.

role.label: Document Transition Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as a transition report.

role.label: Document Type
role.documentation: The type of document being provided (such as 10-K, 10-Q, 485BPOS, etc). The document type is limited to the same value as the supporting SEC submission type, or the word 'Other'.

role.label: Documents Incorporated by Reference [Text Block]
role.documentation: Documents incorporated by reference.

role.label: Domestic Tax Jurisdiction [Member]
role.documentation: Designated federal jurisdiction entitled to levy and collect income tax in country of domicile. Includes, but is not limited to, national jurisdiction for non-U.S. jurisdiction.

role.terseLabel: Dividends or Other Earnings Paid on Equity Awards not Otherwise Reflected in Total Compensation for Covered Year
role.label: Dividends or Other Earnings Paid on Equity Awards not Otherwise Reflected in Total Compensation for Covered Year [Member]

role.terseLabel: Net income per share of common stock attributable to common stockholders
role.label: Earnings Per Share [Abstract]
Earnings Per Share, Basic
role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

role.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

role.terseLabel: Net Income per Share of Common Stock Attributable to Common Stockholders
role.label: Earnings Per Share, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for computing basic and diluted earnings or loss per share for each class of common stock and participating security. Addresses all significant policy factors, including any antidilutive items that have been excluded from the computation and takes into account stock dividends, splits and reverse splits that occur after the balance sheet date of the latest reporting period but before the issuance of the financial statements.

role.terseLabel: Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents and restricted cash
role.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalent, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalent, Including Discontinued Operation
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate change on cash and cash equivalent, and cash and cash equivalent restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currency; including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalent includes, but is not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent [Abstract]
Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Cross-Border Tax Effect, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) from difference to expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying statutory federal (national) income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to cross-border tax law.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to statutory income tax expense (benefit) outside of the country of domicile.

role.terseLabel: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation [Line Items]
role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Other, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nontaxable Manufacturing Credit, Amount
role.documentation: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nontaxable Manufacturing Credit, Amount

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

role.terseLabel: Excess tax benefits related to stock-based compensation
role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Expense (Benefit), Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Expense (Benefit), Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about income tax rate reconciliation between amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operation to amount of income tax expense(benefit) that would result from applying statutory federal (national) tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax contingencies. Includes, but not limited to, domestic tax contingency, foreign tax contingency, state and local tax contingency, and other contingencies.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Foreign, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign tax credit.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Research, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to research tax credit.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Exempt Income, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

role.label: Employee-related Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Amount Capitalized
role.documentation: Amount of cost capitalized for award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.terseLabel: Employee Service Share Based Compensation Allocation Of Recognized Period Costs [Line Items]

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount

role.documentation: Weighted-average period over which cost not yet recognized is expected to be recognized for award under share-based payment arrangement, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.terseLabel: Excess tax benefits related to stock-based compensation

role.label: Entity Address, Address Line One
role.documentation: Address Line 1 such as Attn, Building Name, Street Name

role.label: Entity Address, City or Town
role.documentation: Name of the City or Town

role.label: Entity Address, Postal Zip Code
role.documentation: Code for the postal or zip code

role.label: Entity Address, State or Province
role.documentation: Name of the state or province.

role.label: Entity Central Index Key
role.documentation: A unique 10-digit SEC-issued value to identify entities that have filed disclosures with the SEC. It is commonly abbreviated as CIK.

role.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
role.documentation: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

role.label: Entity Current Reporting Status
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' whether registrants (1) have filed all reports required to be filed by Section 13 or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that registrants were required to file such reports), and (2) have been subject to such filing requirements for the past 90 days. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.label: Entity Emerging Growth Company
role.documentation: Indicate if registrant meets the emerging growth company criteria.

role.label: Entity File Number
role.documentation: Commission file number. The field allows up to 17 characters. The prefix may contain 1-3 digits, the sequence number may contain 1-8 digits, the optional suffix may contain 1-4 characters, and the fields are separated with a hyphen.

role.label: Entity Filer Category
role.documentation: Indicate whether the registrant is one of the following: Large Accelerated Filer, Accelerated Filer, Non-accelerated Filer. Definitions of these categories are stated in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.terseLabel: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.label: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.documentation: Two-character EDGAR code representing the state or country of incorporation.

role.label: Entity Interactive Data Current
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant has submitted electronically every Interactive Data File required to be submitted pursuant to Rule 405 of Regulation S-T during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that the registrant was required to submit such files).

role.label: Entity Public Float
role.documentation: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

role.label: Entity Registrant Name
role.documentation: The exact name of the entity filing the report as specified in its charter, which is required by forms filed with the SEC.

role.label: Entity Shell Company
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant is a shell company as defined in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act.

role.label: Entity Small Business
role.documentation: Indicates that the company is a Smaller Reporting Company (SRC).

role.label: Entity Tax Identification Number
role.documentation: The Tax Identification Number (TIN), also known as an Employer Identification Number (EIN), is a unique 9-digit value assigned by the IRS.

role.label: Entity Voluntary Filers
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' if the registrant is not required to file reports pursuant to Section 13 or Section 15(d) of the Act.

role.label: Entity Well-known Seasoned Issuer
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' if the registrant is a well-known seasoned issuer, as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act. Is used on Form Type: 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, 20-F, 6-K, 10-K/A, 10-Q/A, 20-F/A, 6-K/A, N-CSR, N-Q, N-1A.

role.terseLabel: Equity Awards Adjustments, Excluding Value Reported in Compensation Table
role.label: Equity Awards Adjustments, Excluding Value Reported in the Compensation Table [Member]

role.terseLabel: Aggregate Grant Date Fair Value of Equity Award Amounts Reported in Summary Compensation Table
role.label: Aggregate Grant Date Fair Value of Equity Award Amounts Reported in Summary Compensation Table [Member]
Equity Component [Domain]
role.documentation: Components of equity are the parts of the total Equity balance including that which is allocated to common, preferred, treasury stock, retained earnings, etc.

Estimate of Fair Value Measurement [Member]
role.documentation: Measured as an estimate of fair value.

role.terseLabel: Fair Value Assets And Liabilities Measured On Recurring And Nonrecurring Basis [Line Items]
role.label: Fair Value, Assets and Liabilities Measured on Recurring and Nonrecurring Basis [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.terseLabel: Fair Value Assets And Liabilities Measured On Recurring And Nonrecurring Basis [Table]
role.label: Fair Value, Recurring and Nonrecurring [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about asset and liability measured at fair value on recurring and nonrecurring basis.

role.label: Fair Value Hierarchy and NAV [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by level within fair value hierarchy and fair value measured at net asset value per share as practical expedient.

role.label: Measurement Basis [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by measurement basis.

role.label: Fair Value Measurement [Domain]
role.documentation: Measurement basis, for example, but not limited to, reported value, fair value, portion at fair value, portion at other than fair value.

role.label: Fair Value Disclosures [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for the fair value of financial instruments (as defined), including financial assets and financial liabilities (collectively, as defined), and the measurements of those instruments as well as disclosures related to the fair value of non-financial assets and liabilities. Such disclosures about the financial instruments, assets, and liabilities would include: (1) the fair value of the required items together with their carrying amounts (as appropriate); (2) for items for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value, disclosure would include: (a) information pertinent to estimating fair value (including, carrying amount, effective interest rate, and maturity, and (b) the reasons why it is not practicable to estimate fair value; (3) significant concentrations of credit risk including: (a) information about the activity, region, or economic characteristics identifying a concentration, (b) the maximum amount of loss the entity is exposed to based on the gross fair value of the related item, (c) policy for requiring collateral or other security and information as to accessing such collateral or security, and (d) the nature and brief description of such collateral or security; (4) quantitative information about market risks and how such risks are managed; (5) for items measured on both a recurring and nonrecurring basis information regarding the inputs used to develop the fair value measurement; and (6) for items presented in the financial statement for which fair value measurement is elected: (a) information necessary to understand the reasons for the election, (b) discussion of the effect of fair value changes on earnings, (c) a description of [similar groups] items for which the election is made and the relation thereof to the balance sheet, the aggregate carrying value of items included in the balance sheet that are not eligible for the election; (7) all other required (as defined) and desired information.

role.label: Fair Value, Inputs, Level 1 [Member]
role.documentation: Quoted prices in active markets for identical assets or liabilities that the reporting entity can access at the measurement date.

role.label: Fair Value, Inputs, Level 2 [Member]
role.documentation: Inputs other than quoted prices included within level 1 that are observable for an asset or liability, either directly or indirectly, including, but not limited to, quoted prices for similar assets or liabilities in active markets, or quoted prices for identical or similar assets or liabilities in inactive markets.

role.label: Fair Value, Inputs, Level 3 [Member]
role.documentation: Unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

role.label: Fair Value Hierarchy and NAV [Domain]
role.documentation: Categories used to prioritize the inputs to valuation techniques to measure fair value.

role.label: Finance Lease Expense

role.terseLabel: Operating cash outflows from finance leases (interest payments)
role.label: Finance Lease, Interest Payment on Liability

role.verboseLabel: Long-term debt and finance leases, net of current portion
role.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Noncurrent

role.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

role.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

role.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

role.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
role.documentation: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

role.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
role.documentation: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

role.terseLabel: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Statement of Financial Position [Extensible Enumeration]
role.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Statement of Financial Position [Extensible Enumeration]
role.documentation: Indicates line item in statement of financial position that includes finance lease right-of-use asset.

role.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent

role.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Remaining Lease Term
role.documentation: Weighted average remaining lease term for finance lease, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.documentation: The major class of finite-lived intangible asset (for example, patents, trademarks, copyrights, etc.) A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar, either by their nature or by their use in the operations of a company.

role.documentation: Gigafactory Texas with del valle independent school.

role.documentation: Gigafactory Texas With Travis.

role.label: Goodwill
role.documentation: Amount, after accumulated impairment loss, of asset representing future economic benefit arising from other asset acquired in business combination or from joint venture formation or both, that is not individually identified and separately recognized.

role.label: Goodwill and Intangible Assets, Goodwill, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for goodwill. This accounting policy also may address how an entity assesses and measures impairment of goodwill, how reporting units are determined, how goodwill is allocated to such units, and how the fair values of the reporting units are determined.

role.label: Goodwill, Impaired, Accumulated Impairment Loss
role.documentation: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for asset representing future economic benefit arising from other asset acquired in business combination or from joint venture formation or both, that is not individually identified and separately recognized.

role.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
role.documentation: Amount of impairment loss from asset representing future economic benefit arising from other asset acquired in business combination or from joint venture formation or both, that is not individually identified and separately recognized.

role.label: Goodwill, Period Increase (Decrease)
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) of asset representing future economic benefit arising from other asset acquired in business combination or from joint venture formation or both, that is not individually identified and separately recognized.

role.label: Government Assistance Programs and Incentives [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Government assistance programs and incentives.

role.documentation: An amount representing the long-term government rebates receivables.

role.label: Grant Funding Equal Percentage on Property Taxes Paid
role.documentation: Grant funding equal percentage on property taxes paid

role.label: Gross Profit
role.documentation: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

role.label: Guarantor Obligations, Nature [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by nature of guarantee.

role.label: Guarantor Obligations, Maximum Exposure, Undiscounted
role.documentation: Maximum potential amount of future payments (undiscounted) the guarantor could be required to make under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees before reduction for potential recoveries under recourse or collateralization provisions.

role.label: Guarantor Obligations, Nature [Domain]
role.documentation: Represents a description of the nature of the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees.

role.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
role.documentation: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

role.terseLabel: Long-Lived Assets Including Acquired Intangible Assets
role.label: Impairment or Disposal of Long-Lived Assets, Including Intangible Assets, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for the impairment and disposal of long-lived assets including goodwill and other intangible assets.

role.terseLabel: Noncontrolling interest and redeemable noncontrolling interest
role.label: Income loss from continuing operations before income taxes attributable to noncontrolling interest and redeemable noncontrolling interest
role.documentation: Income loss from continuing operations before income taxes attributable to noncontrolling interest and redeemable noncontrolling interest

role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic
role.documentation: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.

role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
role.documentation: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Foreign
role.documentation: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to foreign operations, which is defined as Income or Loss generated from operations located outside the entity's country of domicile.

role.label: Statement of Income Location, Balance [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by location in statement of income where disaggregated amount is reported.

role.label: Statement of Income Location, Balance [Domain]
role.documentation: Location in statement of income where disaggregated amount is reported.

role.label: Income Tax Jurisdiction [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by income tax jurisdiction.

role.label: Income Tax Jurisdiction [Domain]
role.documentation: Income tax jurisdiction.

role.label: Income Tax Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for income tax.

role.totalLabel: Total provision for (benefit from) income taxes
role.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

role.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Amount [Abstract]
Income Tax Paid, Federal, after Refund Received
role.documentation: Amount, after income tax refund received, of cash paid to federal (national) tax jurisdiction for tax on income.

role.label: Income Tax Paid, Foreign, after Refund Received
role.documentation: Amount, after income tax refund received, of cash paid to foreign tax jurisdiction for tax on income.

role.label: Income Tax Paid, Foreign, after Refund Received [Abstract]
Income Tax Paid, State and Local, after Refund Received
role.documentation: Amount, after income tax refund received, of cash paid to state and local tax jurisdictions for tax on income.

role.label: Income Tax, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for income taxes, which may include its accounting policies for recognizing and measuring deferred tax assets and liabilities and related valuation allowances, recognizing investment tax credits, operating loss carryforwards, tax credit carryforwards, and other carryforwards, methodologies for determining its effective income tax rate and the characterization of interest and penalties in the financial statements.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax expense (benefit).

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
role.documentation: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Other, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

role.terseLabel: State tax, net of federal benefit
role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax expense (benefit).

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in income tax contingencies. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax contingency, foreign tax contingency, state and local tax contingency, and other contingencies.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax credits. Including, but not limited to, research credit, foreign tax credit, investment tax credit, and other tax credits.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Foreign, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign tax credit.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Research, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to research tax credit.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Exempt Income, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

role.terseLabel: Cash paid income taxes, net of refunds
role.totalLabel: Total cash paid for income taxes, net of refunds
role.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after refund, of cash paid to foreign, federal, state, and local jurisdictions as income tax.

role.terseLabel: Accounts payable, accrued and other liabilities
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

role.terseLabel: Changes in operating assets and liabilities:
role.label: Adjustment to Reconcile Net Income to Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activity, Increase (Decrease) in Operating Capital [Abstract]
Increase Decrease In Operating Lease Vehicles
role.documentation: Increase decrease in operating lease vehicles.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepaid expenses, and assets classified as other.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) In Remaining Performance Obligation
role.documentation: Increase (Decrease) In Remaining Performance Obligation

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Stockholders' Equity [Roll Forward]
role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Temporary Equity [Roll Forward]
role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.

role.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Call Options and Warrants
role.documentation: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of call options and warrants using the treasury stock method.

role.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Conversion of Debt Securities
role.documentation: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of convertible debt securities using the if-converted method.

role.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-Based Payment Arrangements
role.documentation: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures [Line Items]

role.terseLabel: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Adopted
role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Adopted [Flag]

role.terseLabel: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Not Adopted
role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Not Adopted [Text Block]
Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
role.documentation: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

role.label: Interest Expense, Nonoperating
role.documentation: Amount of interest expense classified as nonoperating.

role.label: Interest Income, Short-Term Investment, Other
role.documentation: Amount of interest income from short-term investment classified as other.

role.terseLabel: Cash paid during the period for interest
role.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activity
role.documentation: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

role.label: Internal Use Software, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for costs incurred when both (1) the software is acquired, internally developed, or modified solely to meet the entity's internal needs, and (2) during the software's development or modification, no substantive plan exists or is being developed to market the software externally.

role.label: Inventory, Current [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about inventory expected to be sold or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Inventory Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for inventory. Includes, but is not limited to, the basis of stating inventory, the method of determining inventory cost, the classes of inventory, and the nature of the cost elements included in inventory.

role.label: Inventory, Finished Goods, Net of Reserves
role.documentation: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods held by the company that are readily available for sale.

role.label: Inventory [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Inventory, Net
role.documentation: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Inventory, Parts and Components, Net of Reserves
role.documentation: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date for elements of machinery or equipment held for the purpose of replacing similar parts in the course of repair or maintenance.

role.label: Inventory, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of inventory accounting policy for inventory classes, including, but not limited to, basis for determining inventory amounts, methods by which amounts are added and removed from inventory classes, loss recognition on impairment of inventories, and situations in which inventories are stated above cost.

role.label: Inventory, Raw Materials, Net of Reserves
role.documentation: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of unprocessed items to be consumed in the manufacturing or production process.

role.label: Inventory, Work in Process, Net of Reserves
role.documentation: Carrying amount, net of reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods which are partially completed. This inventory is generally comprised of raw materials, labor and factory overhead costs, which require further materials, labor and overhead to be converted into finished goods, and which generally require the use of estimates to determine percentage complete and pricing.

role.label: Inventory Write-down
role.documentation: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

role.label: Investment Income, Interest
role.documentation: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

role.label: Investment, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for investment in financial asset.

role.label: Investment Tax Credit
role.documentation: The amount deducted from an entities' taxes, reflecting a percentage of an amount invested in certain assets spread over the useful life of those assets; includes deferred investment tax credits.

role.label: Kathleen Wilson-Thompson [Member]
role.documentation: Kathleen Wilson-Thompson

role.label: Land and Building [Member]
role.documentation: Real estate held for productive use and structures used in the conduct of business, including but not limited to, office, production, storage and distribution facilities.

role.label: Lease, Cost
role.documentation: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Components of Lease Expense and Other Information Related to Leases
role.label: Lease, Cost [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of lessee's lease cost. Includes, but is not limited to, interest expense for finance lease, amortization of right-of-use asset for finance lease, operating lease cost, short-term lease cost, variable lease cost and sublease income.

role.label: Lease Deposit Liability
role.documentation: Amount of liability for lease payments received, including variable lease payments, when collectability is not probable at commencement date for sales-type lease.

role.label: Leased Assets Accumulated Depreciation And Amortization
role.documentation: Leased assets accumulated depreciation and amortization.

role.terseLabel: Gross cost of solar energy systems
role.label: Leased Assets Gross
role.documentation: Leased assets gross.

role.terseLabel: Energy generation and storage systems, net
role.label: Leased Assets Net
role.documentation: Leased assets net.

role.label: Leasehold Improvements [Member]
role.documentation: Additions or improvements to assets held under a lease arrangement.

role.label: Lessee, Finance Leases [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for finance leases of lessee. Includes, but is not limited to, description of lessee's finance lease and maturity analysis of finance lease liability.

role.label: Lessee, Lease, Description [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Lessee, Lease, Description [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about lessee's leases.

role.terseLabel: Lease not yet commenced, term of contract
role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Lease Not yet Commenced, Term of Contract
role.documentation: Term of lessee's operating lease not yet commenced, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.terseLabel: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Maturity
role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Maturity [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of undiscounted cash flows of lessee's operating lease liability. Includes, but is not limited to, reconciliation of undiscounted cash flows to operating lease liability recognized in statement of financial position.

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

role.label: Lessee, Operating Leases [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for operating leases of lessee. Includes, but is not limited to, description of operating lease and maturity analysis of operating lease liability.

role.label: Lessee, Renewal Term
role.documentation: Lessee, Renewal Term

role.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Fiscal Year Maturity [Abstract]
Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received
role.documentation: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor for operating lease.

role.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Four
role.documentation: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.terseLabel: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Maturity
role.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Maturity [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of maturity of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor on annual basis for operating lease.

role.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year One
role.documentation: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, after Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Three
role.documentation: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Two
role.documentation: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Lessor, Sales-type Lease, Term of Contract
role.documentation: Term of lessor's sales-type lease, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.

role.label: Lessor, Sales-type Leases [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure of lessor's sales-type leases.

role.label: Letters of Credit Outstanding, Amount
role.documentation: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

role.label: Liabilities
role.documentation: Amount of liability recognized for present obligation requiring transfer or otherwise providing economic benefit to others.

role.label: Liabilities and Equity
role.documentation: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

role.label: Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

role.label: Lender Name [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by name of lender, which may be a single entity (for example, but not limited to, a bank, pension fund, venture capital firm) or a group of entities that participate in the line of credit.

role.label: Line of Credit Facility, Lender [Domain]
role.documentation: Identification of the lender, which may be a single entity (for example, a bank, pension fund, venture capital firm) or a group of entities that participate in the line of credit, including a letter of credit facility.

role.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Borrowing Capacity
role.documentation: Maximum borrowing capacity under the credit facility without consideration of any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed or the amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

role.label: Line Of Credit Facility Maximum Commitment Amount
role.documentation: Line of credit facility maximum commitment amount.

role.label: Litigation Settlement, Amount Awarded to Other Party
role.documentation: Amount awarded to other party in judgment or settlement of litigation.

role.documentation: Loans payable term.

role.label: Local Phone Number
role.documentation: Local phone number for entity.

role.label: Long-Term Debt
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt. Excludes lease obligation.

role.terseLabel: Current portion of debt and finance leases
role.totalLabel: Current portion of debt and finance leases

role.label: Long Term Debt And Finance Leases Noncurrent

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, after Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Five
role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
role.documentation: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Type [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of long-term debt.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Type [Domain]
role.documentation: Type of long-term debt arrangement, such as notes, line of credit, commercial paper, asset-based financing, project financing, letter of credit financing. These are debt arrangements that originally required repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company, if longer.

role.label: Equity, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
role.documentation: Amount of equity (deficit) attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes temporary equity.

role.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders
role.documentation: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

role.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Redemptions or Purchase of Interests
role.documentation: Decrease in noncontrolling interest (for example, but not limited to, redeeming or purchasing the interests of noncontrolling shareholders, issuance of shares (interests) by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to the parent entity for other than cash, and a buyback of shares (interest) by the non-wholly owned subsidiary from the noncontrolling interests).

role.label: MNPI Disclosure Timed for Compensation Value [Flag]
Money Market Funds [Member]
role.documentation: Fund that invests in short-term money-market instruments, for example, but not limited to, commercial paper, banker's acceptances, repurchase agreements, government securities, certificates of deposit, and other highly liquid securities.

role.label: Movement in Deferred Revenue [Roll Forward]
role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.

role.terseLabel: Movement in Standard Product Warranty Accrual [Roll Forward]
role.label: Movement in Standard Product Warranty Accrual [Roll Forward]
role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.

MyPower [Member]
role.documentation: MyPower

role.label: Nature of Operations [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for the nature of an entity's business, major products or services, principal markets including location, and the relative importance of its operations in each business and the basis for the determination, including but not limited to, assets, revenues, or earnings. For an entity that has not commenced principal operations, disclosures about the risks and uncertainties related to the activities in which the entity is currently engaged and an understanding of what those activities are being directed toward.

role.totalLabel: Net cash provided by financing activities
role.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activity, Including Discontinued Operation
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activity, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Financing activity includes, but is not limited to, obtaining resource from owner and providing return on, and return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amount borrowed, or settling obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resource obtained from creditor on long-term credit.

role.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activity, Including Discontinued Operation [Abstract]

role.totalLabel: Net cash used in investing activities
role.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activity, Including Discontinued Operation
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activity, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Investing activity includes, but is not limited to, making and collecting loan, acquiring and disposing of debt and equity instruments, property, plant, and equipment, and other productive assets.

role.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activity, Including Discontinued Operation [Abstract]

role.totalLabel: Net cash provided by operating activities
role.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activity, Including Discontinued Operation
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activity, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation. Operating activity includes, but is not limited to, transaction, adjustment, and change in value not defined as investing or financing activity.

role.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activity, Including Discontinued Operation [Abstract]

role.totalLabel: Net income attributable to common stockholders
role.terseLabel: Net income attributable to common stockholders
role.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

role.terseLabel: Net income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interests and redeemable noncontrolling interests in subsidiaries
role.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
role.documentation: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

role.totalLabel: Net income used in computing basic net income per share of common stock
role.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

role.totalLabel: Net income used in computing diluted net income per share of common stock
role.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Diluted
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

role.label: Net Income Loss Including Portion Attributable To Redeemable Non Controlling Interest And Non Controlling Interest In Subsidiaries
role.documentation: Net income loss including portion attributable to redeemable non-controlling interest and non-controlling interest in subsidiaries.

role.label: Net Investment In Sales Type Leases [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Net investment in sales-type leases.

role.documentation: Net Loss Realized And Included In Net Income

role.terseLabel: Accounting Standards Update and Change in Accounting Principle [Table]
role.label: Accounting Standards Update and Change in Accounting Principle [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about change in accounting principle or amendment to accounting standards or both. Includes, but is not limited to, nature, reason, and method of adopting amendment to accounting standards and other change in accounting principle.

role.label: New Accounting Pronouncements, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy pertaining to new accounting pronouncements that may impact the entity's financial reporting. Includes, but is not limited to, quantification of the expected or actual impact.

role.terseLabel: Non-PEO NEO Average Compensation Actually Paid Amount
role.label: Non-PEO NEO Average Compensation Actually Paid Amount

role.terseLabel: Non-PEO NEO Average Total Compensation Amount
role.label: Non-PEO NEO Average Total Compensation Amount
